metadata.title: CVE-2014-4987 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
server_user_groups.php in phpMyAdmin 4.1.x before 4.1.14.2 and 4.2.x before4.2.6 allows remote authenticated users to bypass intended accessrestrictions and read the MySQL user list via a viewUsers request.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-4987` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

phpmyadmin - 4:4.2.6-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4:4.2.6-1').
